title: Friendslists Workaround Tip for New Accounts
body: Since Riot refuses to allow you to see your friends list on the website, probably because they don't want you making a new account and having the benefit of adding all your friends back, i had an idea. I simply wrote the name down of every friend on my friends list on a notepad file. a microsoft word file would work too. this way if you ever make a new account you can just add all your friends again. Because **** Riot :)
